title: Metadata V2
description: A schema describing metadata for wed modes. Version 2.

generator.description: The name of the software that generated the JSON.

date.description: The date at which the file was generated.

version.description: Records the version number of the format of the metadata file.

namespaces.description: Prefix -> uri mapping of absolute namespaces.

elements.description: An array of all elements in the schema.

name.description: The local name of the element.

ns.description: The namespace URI of the element.

inline.description: An object determining which elements are inline.

method.description: The method by which elements are addressed

dochtml.description: A URL to where the schema's documentation is stored.
